descriptions.description:
This dataset contains data from the Lunar Seismic Profiling Experiment as well as results from the JGR: Planets publication "Thermal moonquake characterization and cataloging using frequency-based algorithms and stochastic gradient descent". 
The code to compute the results can be found in the GitHub here:
https://github.com/civilinifr/thermal_mq_analysis
also published through Zenodo here:
http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8025056
 
v2: Fixed files in LSPE_sac_hourly.zip to contain correct start and end times. 
 
Includes:

Thermal moonquake catalog of Grade-A LSPE events
Daily ASCII files in units of decompressed volts (filenames daily_ascii_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMDD.zip)
Hourly SAC files in units of decompressed volts (filename LSPE_sac_hourly.zip)
Hourly SAC files in units of nm/s (filenames LSPE_sac_hourly_phys_p1.zip and LSPE_sac_hourly_phys_p2.zip)
Analysis results from the manuscript (filename lunar_output.zip)

titles.title: Apollo 17 Lunar Seismic Profiling Experiment Seismic Data and Thermal Moonquake Catalog
